Detailed Description

A HintBox is a widget containing a quick little message for the user.

The HintBox class helps you create and show those.

 class MyComboClickListener : public gaia::ui::ComboClickListener
 {
 public:
   gaia::core::Page* mpPage;
   gaia::core::Scene* mpScene;
   gaia::ui::TextWidget* mpTextWidget;
   gaia::ui::HintBox* mpHintBox;
   gaia::ui::HintBox* mpHintBox2;
   MyComboClickListener(gaia::core::Page* pPage){
       mpPage = pPage;
       mpScene = mpPage->getSceneSingleton();
       mpTextWidget = new gaia::ui::TextWidget(mpPage);
       mpHintBox = NULL;
       mpHintBox2 = NULL;
   };
   ~MyComboClickListener() {
       if (mpTextWidget!=NULL){
           delete mpTextWidget;
           mpTextWidget = NULL;
       }
       if (mpHintBox!=NULL){
           delete mpHintBox;
           mpHintBox = NULL;
       }
       if (mpHintBox2!=NULL){
           delete mpHintBox2;
           mpHintBox2 = NULL;
       }
   };
   void onClick(int position, long long id, const gaia::base::String& str){
       if (position<4){
           gaia::base::String mystr1(str+"\n\n1234567890");
           if (mpHintBox==NULL){
               mpHintBox = gaia::ui::HintBox::makeTextN(mpPage, mystr1, 0);
               if (mpHintBox) {
                   mpHintBox->show();
               }
           }
           else { //reuse the previous HintBox
               mpHintBox->setText(mystr1);
               mpHintBox->show();
           }
       } else {
           mpTextWidget->setText(str+"\nABCDEFGH");

           if (mpHintBox2==NULL){
               mpHintBox2 = new gaia::ui::HintBox(mpPage);
           }

           mpHintBox2->setWidget(mpTextWidget);
           mpHintBox2->setDuration(1); //0: short=2 sec, 1: long=3.5 sec
           mpHintBox2->setLocation(100,300);
           mpHintBox2->show();
       }

   };
 };
